item.title: Can Non-Developers Finally Build WordPress Plugins? (Yes, and Here's How) - blog.pluginpal.app
item.description: For years, if you wanted a custom WordPress plugin, you had three options: - Hire a developer (expensive, time-consuming) - Use a bloated plugin that sort of worked - Or...

item.title: Welcome to the Plugin Pal blog - blog.pluginpal.app
item.description: Let's keep this simple. Plugin Pal is live - and this blog is where it all unfolds. If you're a WordPress developer (or even just plugin-curious), this is for you....
